original: Berglund, Nils Ivar, advokat, Norrköping, f. 25/7/02 i Malmö av bygg-mäst. Nils B. o. Elina Jönsson. G. 30 m. Ruth Anders^son. Barn: Gunvor f. 31, Torvald o. Anette 45. — Stud:ex. i Malmö 20, jur. kand. i Lund 25. Adv. i Norrköp., förb :jurist f. Bilverkstädernas riksförb. Led. av Sv:-es adv:samf. sed. 33. Skr.: upps. i tidskr. Bilverkstäderna.
translated: Berglund, Nils Ivar, lawyer, Norrköping, born July 25th, 1902 in Malmö to builder Nils B. and Elina Jönsson. Married to Ruth Andersson in 1930. Children: Gunvor born in 1931, Torvald and Anette born in 1945. Graduated from high school in Malmö in 1920 and received a law degree from Lund University in 1925. Works as a lawyer in Norrköping and is a legal advisor for the National Federation of Automotive Repair Shops. Member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1933. Has written papers in the magazine Bilverkstäderna.

memberOf.name: National Federation of Automotive Repair Shops
